type.title: Environment Variable and Set-UID Lab
type.description:
Launching attacks on privileged Set-UID root program. Risks of environment variables. Side effects of
        system().
files: Checklist for Security of Setuid Programs

type.title: Packet Sniffing and Spoofing Lab
type.description: Sniffing packets sent over the local network and spoofing various types of packets.

type.title: Firewall Exploration Lab
type.description:
Writing a simple packet-filter firewall; playing with Linux's built-in firewall software and
        web-proxy firewall; experimenting with ways to evade firewalls.

type.title: Firewall Evasion Lab
type.description:
Implement a simple vpn program (client/server), and use it to
        bypass firewalls.
files: Sample VPN client and server programs (without encryption)

type.title: RSA Public-Key Encryption and Signature Lab
type.description:
Write a program to implement the RSA algorithm, and use it to do encryption,
      decryption, signature generation and verification.

type.title: Secret Key Encryption Lab
type.description: Explore the secret-key encryption and its applications using OpenSSL.

type.title: Pseudo Random Number Generation Lab
type.description: Learn how to generate pseudo random numbers that are strong for security purposes.

type.title: Public-Key Infrastructure (PKI) Lab
type.description: Explore public-key cryptography, digital signature, certificate, and PKI using OpenSSL.

type.title: Android Device Rooting Lab
type.description: Develop an OTA (Over-The-Air) package from scratch to root an Android device.
